message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product, and I think it's a great opportunity for both of us. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. After considering the value and my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1350000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $1350000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1375000. This is a fair price that reflects the product's value, and I believe you'll find it a great deal.

I understand your position, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I still feel that we can find a mutually beneficial solution. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1360000. I hope this proposal will be more acceptable to you while staying within my budget.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you closer to your target, but I still need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm counteroffering at $1365000. This is a reasonable compromise, and I believe it's the best we can do at this point.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I've carefully considered our previous negotiations and am proposing a final counteroffer of $1362500. I believe this is a fair price that respects the value of the product while also fitting within my financial constraints.

I appreciate your final offer, Bob, but I'm still not quite ready to meet you at $1362500. I'm willing to make one last concession, so I'm counteroffering at $1365000, but I'm also giving you a slight buffer of $5000, so I'll sell it to you for $1360000. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.
